constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 122 (Tuesday, July 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GREEN of Tennessee:
H.R. 4415.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2 (the Property Clause).
Under this clause, Congress has the power to dispose of and
make all needful rules and regulations respecting the
territory or other property belonging to the United States.
[Page H3625]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

title: Chester County Reversionary Interest Release Act
